content.question: The type of economic activity shown in the image would contribute most directly to which of the following developments in the late twentieth century?

choices.label: The emergence of global corporate brands
Increased global dependence on fossil fuels
The spread of communist ideas around the world
Growing reliance of Western economies on foreign tourism

content.answer: Increased global dependence on fossil fuels

topic.text: 9.9: Continuity and Change in a Globalized World

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
